content.html: I’m sure what Chris Rock said was offensive I’m also sure that there is no excuse for what Will Smith did Optics of giving a man an award a few minutes after being violent are not good Male violence escapes justice much of the time It is the pandemic that will outlast any other
content.value:
I’m sure what Chris Rock said was offensive 
I’m also sure that there is no excuse for what Will Smith did

Optics of giving a man an award a few minutes after being violent are not good
Male violence escapes justice much of the time
It is the pandemic that will outlast any other
